data.title: Miller & Terry Attorneys at Law
data.meta_description: When you need a trustworthy criminal defense attorney in Lee's Summit, Missouri, call Miller & Terry Attorneys at Law at 816.524.8718.
data.text:
The Miller and Terry, LLC law office was established to protect the rights and interests of our clients. Located in Leeâ€™s Summit, Missouri, we serve both Kansas and Missouri clients from all over the Kansas City area. From strategic criminal defense to general civil litigation law, we take a comprehensive approach when it comes to the courtroom.

Daniel Miller graduated from UMKC Law School in 1985 and was admitted to the Missouri Bar on October 11, 1985. He has practiced law for over 37 years. He was a public defender for six years and a prosecutor for seventeen years. In that time he tried over 175 trials including 84 murder trials and five death penalty trials. He concentrates his work in the firm on misdemeanor and felony cases.

As a licensed Missouri criminal defense lawyer with 37 years under his belt, Daniel Miller calls upon his experience as a prosecutor, public defender and former Missouri State Trooper to obtain the best result for his clients. His wide experience with criminal trial work, DUI/DWI case work, and other misdemeanor charges allows Daniel and his law firm to represent clients to the fullest the firm can offer. His trial record speaks for itself. Daniel Miller is not afraid of going to trial.
